body_html:
I just installed Cuda using apt-get and copy and pasted all the CudNN files into the usr folder and using the pip GPU installation everything worked dandy. Just need to modify chmod and bash updates.

I walked through the whole process here.
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=HM57GyqwGxA
